summary: Provides an MXNetâ€‘based implementation of the GraphSAGE convolutional operator for DGL, handling neighbor aggregation, feature combination, linear projection, and optional dropout, bias, normalization, and activation for both homogeneous and bipartite graphs.
business_intent: Allows developers to build scalable graph neural network models using the GraphSAGE architecture on the MXNet platform, simplifying the integration of graph data processing into deep learning pipelines.
